successes.title: Glowing Plants: Natural Lighting with no Electricity
successes.description: Create GLOWING PLANTS using synthetic biology and Genome Compiler's software - the first step in creating sustainable natural lighting

Pledges.description: You'll get a 2"x3" sticker showing the worlds first glowing plant to put on your phone or laptop! And if that's not enough, your name will be added to our website and book as a supporter.
SUPPORTER - inspire others by showing off this snazzy t-shirt
GLOWING PLANT SEEDS. Grow your own glowing plant at home, includes full instructions for how to tend and care for it
GLOWING PLANT SEEDS Batch II. Grow your own glowing plant at home, includes full instructions for how to tend and care for it
Recycled light bulb vase that you can show off to your friends
rootcupPLANTER - perfect for growing your Glowing Plant seeds.  BONUS: Glowing plant seeds
Vase II: A minimalist vase made from an old light bulb. BONUS: Glowing plant seeds
INSPIRE YOURSELF: Beautiful printed photo book detailing the process for how we make the plant.
EARLY BIRD. Be the first to get an actual glowing plant.
GLOWING PLANT. We will grow and ship you an actual glowing arabidopsis plant. Use it as a nightlight or show your friends how cool synthetic biology is
DIY MAKER KIT: A copy of the book, a full set of instructions and all the ingedients you need to transform your own plant at home, in your lab or at school.
